---
title: "Join the workshop"
---

This course is aimed primarily at graduate students in the Department of Statistics at the University of Warwick. It is also open to 3rd and 4th year undergraduate students and members of staff in the Department of Statistics.

Space permitting, the workshop is also open to all interested members of the University of Warwick.

To express your interest in joining the workshop, please fill in the form, linked below (it may take a moment to load). 

Please sign-up by June 11th. Places will be confirmed by e-mail by June 12th.
